sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import RTCMultiConnection from 'rtcmulticonnection' import { useRouteMatch } from 'react-router' import { Form, Button, Row, Col, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import Toast from '../utils/notifications' function StudentPage() { const history = useHistory() console.log('history', history) const connection = new RTCMultiConnection() connection.socketURL = 'https://rtcmulticonnection.herokuapp.com:443/' connection.session = { audio: true, video: true } connection.sdpConstraints.mandatory = { OfferToReceiveAudio: true, OfferToReceiveVideo: true, } const [user, setUser] = useState({ name: '', camera: true, micro: false, role: 'host' }) console.log('connection getAllParticipants', connection.getAllParticipants()) const match = useRouteMatch() let roomId = match?.params?.uuid || 1 const [show, setShow] = useState(true) const handleChangeUser = (name, value) => { setUser(prevTags => { return { ...prevTags, [name]: value } }) } const handleChangeSwitch = (name) => { setUser(prevTags => { return { ...prevTags, [name]: !prevTags[name] } }) } const handleClose = () => setShow(false) // const handleShow = () => setShow(true) const handleSubmit = (event) => { event.preventDefault() console.log('connection', connection) let numberOfUsers = connection.getAllParticipants().length console.log('numberOfUsers', numberOfUsers) connection.user = user console.log('connection getAllParticipants', connection.getAllParticipants()) // roomId = connection.token() connection.openOrJoin(roomId) Toast.success('You are joining the class!!!', '') history.push(history.location.pathname, {user}) handleClose() return false } console.log('connection getAllParticipants', connection.getAllParticipants()) return (
JOIN CLASS ROOM
handleSubmit(event)}> Name handleChangeUser('name', event.target.value)} /> Camera handleChangeSwitch('camera')} /> micro handleChangeSwitch('micro')} />

Teacher: {user.name}
) } export default StudentPage
